metadata.dc:author: Romero Pérez, P
Mira Llinares, A
metadata.dc:description: The present paper reviews the various therapeutical schemes with which urologists have approached the difficult problem of urethral stenosis. It pictures a brief history of one particular chapter of Urology that has troubled men since the dawn of mankind and of which many questions still remain unresolved.
metadata.dc:title: Reseñas históricas sobre el tratamiento de la estenosis uretral.
[Historic review of the treatment of urethral stenosis].
